info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield and central Westchester Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 901 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bedford, or near New Canaan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Norwalk, New Canaan, Fairfield, Greenwich, Westport, Ridgefield, Darien, Wilton, Weston, Redding, Bedford, Georgetown and Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
